ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 192
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I don t know about the ones in Runneye, but in East Karanas, one conned even to me at level 17.I made the foolish mistake of trying to fight it(although I
ygData.messageBody:
Well I don't know about the ones in Runneye, but in East Karanas, one conned
even to me at level 17.I made the foolish mistake of trying to fight
it(although I already knew that they could charm, maybe I was just bored,
hehe)and I got rocked.It charmed my pet and used it against me(which is what
usually happens).I think that some Eyes are Wizards, but the majority of them
are Enchanters.They can cast all of that classes spells of whatever level
they are.(I know it sounds kind of confusing how I wrote that, but basically
if an Eye was level 17 it would be able to cast all of the level 16 spells
for that class)

In a message dated 12/3/99 2:40:51 AM Pacific Standard Time,
EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes:

<< Message: 4
Date: Thu, 2 Dec 1999 11:18:50 -0500
From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
Subject: level of evil eyes in runnyeye

What level are the evil eyes in runnyeye?

I'm 34th and have the 34th pet and one took me out REALLY quick; what spells
do these guys cast, I saw something about my skin igniting. >>
